titles: A lytle treatise of the maner and forme of confession, made by the most excellent and famous clerke, M. Eras. of Roterdame
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: In Flete strete by Ioh[a]n Byddell, at the signe of our lady of Pitie, nexte to Flete bridge, for wyllyam Marshall],
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Title page has border (McKerrow and Ferguson 29) with Byddell's name in type in the sill.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio regali.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
